pengu.messenger

Class PenguMessengerClient

  • java.lang.Object
    • pengu.messenger.PenguMessengerClient

  • public class PenguMessengerClient
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides all the methods necessary for the Pengu Messenger application. It also provides an interface between the GUI code and Working code.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.ActiveChatItem
      This class allows for active chat objects to be created so that active chat information can be stored in an array.
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.ContactItem
      This class allows for contact objects to be created so that contacts information can be stored in an array.
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.ContactType
      This class allows for Contact Type(Groups) Objects to be created so that they and their properties can be stored in an array with other Contact Types.
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.Message
      This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array.
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.PrivateKeyLink
      This class is used to link a private key to a public key (or public key hash).
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.SentMessage
      This class allows for Message objects to be created so that messages can be stored in an array.
      static class  PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException
      Exception class for any server related problem, excluding Forbidden and BadRequest

      • Login

        public void Login(java.lang.String username,
                  java.lang.String password)
           throws PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException,
                  PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException,
                  PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException
        Makes a login attempt with the specified credentials.
        Parameters:
        username - The account username.
        password - The account password
        Throws:
        PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
        PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException
        PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException

      • searchForOtherUsers

        public PenguMessengerRESTClient.PublicKey[] searchForOtherUsers(java.lang.String username)
                                                         throws PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException
        Makes a search for users and their public keys.
        Parameters:
        username - The username (Search Term).
        Returns:
        Returns a PublicKey array of search results. If no search is found, the array length is 0.
        Throws:
        PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException

                     java.lang.String password)
              throws PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException,
                     PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException
        Makes a registration attempt with the specified credentials.S
        Parameters:
        username - The new account username.
        email - The new account email.
        password - The new account password.
        Throws:
        PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
        PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException

      • getListOfActiveChats

      • deleteActiveChat

        public void deleteActiveChat(int chatID)
        Deletes the specified active chat from the database, and all messages in the chat.
        Parameters:
        chatID - The chat ID of the chat to delete.

      • getMessagesForChat

        public PenguMessengerClient.Message[] getMessagesForChat(int chatID)
        Fetches both received and sent messages for a specified chat.
        Parameters:
        chatID - The chat ID to specify the chat.
        Returns:
        Returns an array of Message (also child SentMessage) objects containing the messages sorted by transaction date (oldest - newest).

      • getDetailsForContact

        public PenguMessengerClient.ContactItem getDetailsForContact(java.lang.String username)
        Fetches the details of a specified contact.
        Parameters:
        username - The username of the contact who's details are requested.
        Returns:
        Returns a ContactItem Object containing the user's details, If the contact does not exist null is returned.

      • getContactTypes

        public PenguMessengerClient.ContactType[] getContactTypes()
        Fetches an array of the available contact types and contact type data.
        Returns:
        Returns a ContactType array of available contact types.

                          java.lang.String username)

        Parameters:
        ChatID - The ID of the chat to which the message belongs.
        messageContent - The content of the message.
        username - The username of the chat.

        Returns:

        Parameters:

        Returns:

      • updateCycle

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> updateCycle()
                                                   throws PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException,
                                                          PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException,
                                                          PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
        This method is to be repeated after the user has logged-in. It downloads, sends, and checks for messages.
        Returns:
        Returns an ArrayList of integers: specifying the chat IDs of the chats that received changes.
        Throws:
        PenguRESTClient.UnauthorisedException
        PenguMessengerClient.ServerProblemException
        PenguRESTClient.ForbiddenException
